title: Report
name: Report
description: Runs a predefined Crystal Reports report.

attributes.name: template
attributes.description: Specifies the path to the report definition file, relative to the web root.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description:
The name of the Lucee variable that will hold
            the report output. You cannot specify both name and
            filename.

attributes.name: filename
attributes.description:
The filename to contain the report. You cannot
            specify both name and filename.

attributes.name: query
attributes.description:
The name of the query that contains input data for
            the report. If you omit this parameter, the report
            definition obtains data from the internal SQL or from
            cfreportparam items.

attributes.name: overwrite
attributes.description:
Specifies whether to overwrite files that have the
            same name as that specified in the filename attribute.
            Default: false

attributes.name: encryption
attributes.description:
Specifies whether the output is encrypted. PDF format only.
            Default: none

attributes.name: ownerpassword
attributes.description: Specifies an owner password. PDF format only.

attributes.name: userpassword
attributes.description: Specifies a user password. PDF format only.

attributes.name: permissions
attributes.description:
Specifies one or more permissions. PDF format only.
            Separate multiple permissions with a comma.

attributes.name: datasource
attributes.description: Name of registered or native data source.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description:
- standard (not valid for Crystal Reports 8.0)
                    - netscape
                    - microsoft

attributes.name: timeout
attributes.description:
Maximum time, in seconds, in which a connection must be
            made to a Crystal Report.

attributes.name: report
attributes.description: Specifies the report path. Store Crystal Reports files in the same directories as cfml templates.

attributes.name: orderBy
attributes.description: Orders results according to your specifications.

attributes.name: username
attributes.description:
The username required for entry into the database from which the report is created. Overrides
		the default settings for the data source in the Lucee Administrator.

attributes.name: password
attributes.description:
The password that corresponds to a username required for database access. Overrides the default
		settings for the data source in the Lucee Administrator.

attributes.name: formula
attributes.description: Specifies one or more named formulas. Terminate each formula specification with a semicolon.
